snippet: Johnny Manziel and Brian Hoyer will both take snaps with the Cleveland Browns’ first-team offense in practice this week.
abstract: Cleveland Browns quarterbacks Johnny Manziel and Brian Hoyer will both take snaps with first-team offense in practice, as coach Mike Pettine says he is not ready to choose a starter; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Johnny Manziel and Brian Hoyer will both take snaps with the Cleveland Browns’ first-team offense in practice this week.

headline.main: Browns Will Name Starting Quarterback Soon
headline.print_headline: Browns Will Name Starting Quarterback Soon
